comments:
description:
NPE thrown out when preview cascading parameter with a static parameter

steps to reproduce:
1. new a data source and data set
2. new a cascading parameter
3. new a static parameter
4. drag the static parameter to layout view
5. drag static parameter to cascading parameter group
6. preview

actual result:
NullPointerException thrown out

expected result:
No NullPointerException thrown out

Exception stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at

putedColumn(CachedResultSet.java:380)
	at

(CachedResultSet.java:216)

(CachedResultSet.java:117)

(DataSourceQuery.java:503)

or.executeOdiQuery(PreparedExtendedDSQuery.java:313)

(PreparedQuery.java:627)

(QueryResults.java:98)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.GetParameterDefinitionTask.evaluateQuer
y(GetParameterDefinitionTask.java:586)
	at

lectionChoice(InputParameterDialog.java:621)

ChoiceList(InputParameterDialog.java:533)

arameterComboBox(InputParameterDialog.java:485)
